events.message: I am filing a claim for a car accident that occurred on the morning of April 30th, involving severe rear-end damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description of the vehicle collision.
An insurance agent specialized in auto claims has been assigned to handle the investigation and communication.
Your claim regarding the vehicle accident has been received and acknowledged. We will start the process right away.
Please provide photos of the damaged car, a police report, and any witness statements to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents including accident photos, police report, and contact information of witnesses have been submitted.
The claim investigation has begun, including review of submitted documents and contacting relevant parties.
The investigation into the auto accident claim has been completed with all necessary information collected and reviewed.
A settlement proposal has been issued to cover the repair costs and related expenses from the vehicle collision.
The claimant has acknowledged receipt of the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the offer.
The claim is officially approved following agreement on the settlement terms for the auto accident damages.
Payment covering the approved settlement for the vehicle repair has been issued to the claimantâ€™s account.
The auto accident claim has been closed successfully after full payment and satisfaction confirmation.
The closed claim file has been archived for record-keeping and future reference if needed.
